description: The Local Weather REST API (also called City and Town Weather API) method allows you to access current weather conditions, the next 14 days of accurate and reliable weather forecast, Air Quality Data, Weather Alerts and Monthly Climate Averages for over 4 million cities and towns worldwide. The Local Weather API returns weather elements such as temperature, precipitation (rainfall), weather description, weather icon, wind speed, etc.
name: world_weather_online_api_local_weather_api

description: The Ultimate Local Weather REST API provides unparalleled access to current weather conditions, a precise 14-day weather forecast, comprehensive Air Quality Data, timely Weather Alerts, and detailed Monthly Climate Averages for over 4 million cities and towns globally. This API delivers essential weather elements including temperature, precipitation (rainfall), weather descriptions, weather icons, wind speed, and more, ensuring you receive the most reliable and extensive weather information available.
name: ultimate_local_weather_api
